subject: Sales
title: SNAP Selling
description: A quick, practical guide to SNAP Selling.

hook.text: Buyers are overwhelmed with choices and short on time. SNAP Selling adapts to their frantic reality.

buildup.text: SNAP: keep it Simple, be iNvaluable, always Align, raise Priorities. Four rules for distracted buyers.

discovery.text: Jill Konrath found modern buyers make three key decisions: allow access, choose to change, select you.

twist.text: Complexity kills deals. If your proposal takes thirty minutes to explain, you've already lost the buyer.

climax.text: Strip every pitch to essentials. Make it effortless for overwhelmed buyers to say yes quickly.

punchline.text: Simplify everything. Busy buyers reward clarity.

quiz.question: What does the 'S' in SNAP Selling stand for?
